why aero data management systems

Huge companies

Aero Data Management Systems (ADMS) is a company created from the human value and experience in systems Civil Aviation, Air Traffic Management and Airports.

Years of experience

ADMS is composed of a human staff with 36 years of experience in various companies in the aviation environment.

Сontrol centers and airport systems

Our staff has created installations and commissioning of over 100 control centers and airport systems worldwide.
